name: Bunny Guys!
description:
Dressed as a bunny you start into a world full of adventures!

Fight your way through this parkour and you will experience a mix of difficulty, frustration and fun.



Climb, jump and dodge and think carefully about which step to take. Every mistake can set you back and the frustration increases.



Various traps and obstacles that you must constantly overcome will put you to the test! Do you believe that you can do it? We believe in you.



But be aware that there are very few checkpoints, and you can't SAVE either.

You don't want to play alone? No problem, your friends have the opportunity to start this adventure together with you. The one who reaches the top first is the winner.

If you make it all the way to the top, you will receive the Steam achievement "Golden Bunny"!

The average playing time for a single player is around 60-120 minutes. It depends on them! Now you can start this journey..


https://discord.gg/8zyKXj9SDr
